title: The Migrant experience. Parts 3 and 4 (Captioned)
creator_credit: Film Australia, Australian Institute of Multicultural Affairs, Malcolm Smith, Ben Lewin and Karl McPhee
brief_description: A series of six episodes that present a comprehensive history of the role of migration in the development of Australia. Part 3 “First encounters” looks at how new immigrants were received. Part 4 “Working” examines the experiences of the “new workforce”.
creator_credit_for_label: Film Australia, Australian Institute of Multicultural Affairs, Malcolm Smith, Ben Lewin and Karl McPhee
